title: India Ratings for Indian debt instruments – Oct 18
text:
India Ratings for Indian debt instruments – Oct 18

Stock Markets 28 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 11:12)

© Reuters. India Ratings for Indian debt instruments – Oct 18 Oct 18 (Reuters) - Below are the ratings awarded by India Ratings and Research Private Ltd (India Ratings), formerly known as Fitch Ratings India for local debt instruments as of October 17, 2019. COMPANY INSTRUMENT RATING AMOUNT MOVEMENT (RS.MLN) ------ ---------- ------ ------ --------- SHORT TERM RATINGS: ------------------- Adani (NS: ) Ports And Special IND A1+ 67000 Affirmed Economic Zone Ltd ^Unutilized as of 31 March 2019 Amar Plastic Industries Non-FB limits IND A4+ 50 Migrated to non-cooperating category; (Issuer Not Cooperating) Ansal Housing Non-FB limits (ST) IND D 716.3 Affirmed Minera Steel & Power Pvt Ltd Non-FB WC limit IND A3+ Affirmed National Peroxide Ltd Non-FB WC limits IND A1 Affirmed Revive Construction Company (I) Non-FB Fac (ST) IND D Downgraded and Pvt Ltd migrated to non-cooperating category Shilpa Steel & Power Ltd Non-FB WC limit IND A1 Affirmed MEDIUM TERM RATINGS: ------------------- Ansal Housing Fixed deposit IND tD Affirmed programme(LT) LONG TERM RATINGS: ------------------- Adani Ports And Special NCDs (NCDs) IND AA+/Stable 4520 Affirmed Economic Zone Ltd Adani Ports And Special Proposed NCD* Provisional IND 15000 Affirmed Economic Zone Ltd AA+/Stable * The final rating will be assigned following the closure of the issue upon the receipt of the final documentation, conforming to the information already received by Ind-Ra. Amaltas Educational Welfare IND B 370 Society (Maintained in non-cooperating category),Issuer not cooperating Amaltas Educational Welfare IND B 100 Society (Maintained in non-cooperating category),Issuer not cooperating Ansal Housing Secured overdraft IND D Affirmed Limits (LT) Madurai Trans Carrier Ltd IND A-/Stable Affirmed (reduced from INR579.5mlns) Mansarovar Pearls India Pvt Ltd FB WC limits (LT/ ST) IND D Downgraded Mansarovar Pearls India Pvt Ltd Proposed FB WC limits Provisional IND D150 Downgraded (LT/ ST) Minera Steel & Power Pvt Ltd Proposed FB limits - Withdrawn (the company did not proceed with the instrument as envisaged Minera Steel & Power Pvt Ltd IND BBB/ Positive939 Affirmed Minera Steel & Power Pvt Ltd FB WC limit IND BBB/Positive 850 Affirmed /IND A3+ National Peroxide Ltd FB WC limits Affirmed A+/Stable/IND A1 Revive Construction Company (I) FB Fac (Long-/ST) IND D Downgraded and Pvt Ltd migrated to non-cooperating category Revive Construction Company (I) Proposed FB Provisional IND D300 Downgraded and Pvt Ltd Fac* (Long-/ST) migrated to non-cooperating category *The rating is provisional and shall be confirmed upon the sanction and execution of loan/transaction documents for the above instrument to the satisfaction of Ind-Ra. Revive Construction Company (I) Proposed non-FB Provisional IND D650 Downgraded and Pvt Ltd Fac* (ST) migrated to non-cooperating category *The rating is provisional and shall be confirmed upon the sanction and execution of loan/transaction documents for the above instrument to the satisfaction of Ind-Ra. Scholars International TL (LT) IND D 97.61 Educational Foundation (Maintained in non-cooperating category),Issuer not cooperating Scholars International WC facility (LT) IND D 12.5 Educational Foundation (Maintained in non-cooperating category),Issuer not cooperating Shilpa Steel & Power Ltd Long-TL IND A-/Stable Downgraded (reduced from INR140mlns) Shilpa Steel & Power Ltd FB WC limit IND A-/Stable Downgraded Southco Utility'S FB/non-FB limits Affirmed BB-/Stable/IND A4+ Tayal Sons Ltd FB WC limits IND BBB- /IND A3 250 (Maintained in non-cooperating category),Issuer not cooperating Ub Ventures Pvt Ltd FB WC limit IND BB 70 Migrated to non-cooperating category; (Issuer Not Cooperating) ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Note:- All Indian National-scale ratings previously assigned by Fitch have been transferred to India Ratings & Research Private Ltd (India Ratings), which is a wholly owned subsidiary of the Fitch Group. The withdrawn criteria are now available on India Ratings' website at www.indiaratings.co.in $: Rating watch with positive implication #: Rating Watch with Developing implications @: Rating Watch with Negative Implications %: Rating under Credit Watch wd -Rating Stands Withdrawn sp -Rating Suspended pp -Principal Protected pn -Principal Not Protected INDIA RATINGS may apply + or - signs for ratings to reflect a comparative standing within the category. BG-Bank Guarantee; CC-Cash Credit; CCPS-Cumulative Convertible Preference Share; CD-Certificate of Deposit; CLO-Collateralized Loan Obligation; CPA-Claims Paying Ability; CP-Commercial Paper; CPS-convertible preference shares; CRPS- Cumulative Redeemable Convertible Preference shares; DDB-Deep Discount Bond; EPBI-Exchange premium bond; FBL-Fund Based Limits; FRB/FRN -Floating Rate Bond/Note; ICD -Inter Corporate Deposit; ITD-Immediate Term Debt; LOC-Letter of Credit; LT -Long Term; LTB -Long Term Borrowing; LTD -Long Term Debt; MOCD-multiple option convertible debenture; MTD -Medium term Debenture; MTN-medium term notes; NCD(SO) - Non-Convertible Debenture-(Structured Obligation); NCD-Non-convertible Debentures; NCRB-Non Convertible Redeemable Bonds; NM-Not Meaningful; OCD-optionally convertible debenture; OD-Over Draft; OFCD-Optionally Fully Convertible Debenture; PCD-Partially Convertible Debenture; PCN-partly convertible notes; PCPS-Partly Convertible Preference Share; POCD-partly optional; PP-privately placed; PSPC-Post Shipment & Packing Credit; PS-Preference Shares; PTC-Pass Through Certificates; RPS-Redeemable Preference Shares; SCPN-secured convertible preference notes; SDO-Structured Debt Obligation; SLR-Statutory Liquidity Ratio; SO-Structured Obligation; SPCD - Secured Partly Convertible Debentures; SPN-secured premium notes; STB-Short Term Bond; STD-Short Term Debentures; ST-Short Term; Sub. Bonds-Subordinate Bonds; TB-Taxable Bond; TFB-Tax Free Bond; TL-Term Loan; TOCD-triple option convertible debentures; RWN- Rating Watch Negative; RWN- Rating Watch Evolve.

India Ratings for Indian debt instruments – Oct 18
